alert.note: Alert for Pike; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 04 at 12:01PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN PIKE AND SOUTHEASTERN ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 1230 PM EDT... At 1201 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Bainbridge, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail and frequent cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Lightning can cause serious injury or death. Locations impacted include... Chillicothe, North Folk Village, Londonderry, Summithill, Bourneville, Knockemstiff, Pike County Airport, Richmond Dale, Massieville, Mooresville and Scioto Trail State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. When thunder roars, go indoors! Do not stay in the open or seek shelter under trees when lightning threatens. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
